Items.Title: Resolution concerning the increase in the annual expenditure for the Times Square, 34th Street, 82nd Street, Flatbush Avenue, Downtown-Lower Manhattan, Kings Highway, Church Avenue, East Mid-Manhattan, Fordham Road, DUMBO, and SoHo Business Improvement Districts, and the setting of the date, time and place for the hearing of the local law increasing the annual expenditure for such districts.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Authorizing an increase in the amount to be expended annually in eleven BIDs.
